first_para: "The type of Network Effect under siege at FB is based on 'Beliefs,' whereby each additional person that believes something makes it more likely that the next person will believe the same thing," she wrote. "When Chris Cox (Product Chief) and Chris Daniels (WhatsApp Chief) leave FB because they disagree with the strategic pivot CEO Mark Zuckerberg is instituting, this implies they no longer believe in FB."
